mapper.select: SELECT a.`user_id` as userId, a.`user_name` as userName, a.`email`, a.`phone`, b.`password`, a.`pinyin`, a.`is_active` as isActive, a.`user_info` as userInfo FROM `user` a LEFT JOIN `user_password` b ON a.`user_id` = b.`user_id` WHERE a.user_id = #{value} AND b.`is_active` = 1

SELECT a.`user_id` as userId, a.`user_name` as userName, a.`email`, a.`phone`, e.`password`, a.`pinyin`, a.`is_active` as isActive, b.role_name as roleName, c.team_uuid as teamUuid, d.name as teamName FROM `user` a LEFT JOIN user_role b ON a.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN user_team c ON a.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN team d ON c.team_uuid = d.uuid LEFT JOIN `user_password` e ON a.`user_id` = e.`user_id` WHERE a.user_id = #{value} AND e.`is_active` = 1

SELECT a.`user_id` AS userId, a.`user_name` AS userName, a.`email`, c.`password`, a.`is_active` AS isActive, b.`role_name` AS roleName FROM `user` a LEFT JOIN user_role b ON a.`user_id` = b.`user_id` LEFT JOIN `user_password` c ON a.`user_id` = c.`user_id` WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND c.password = #{password} AND c.`is_active` = 1
